generateFileInfoMessage: Click on 'Generate'. Do not close this page until the file is downloaded.
noRightsText: Ooops! It looks like you have no rights to access this page
importCsvInfo: Import the files to be translated. Add the file in ZIP format and click on upload. Do not change the standard name downloaded from SF. The following CSV files need to be added to the ZIP file:
importWbInfo: Import files in ZIP format. Please add Excel sheets to the ZIP file in the following format: [name_langcode.xlsx].
propertiesSetInfo: Define the properties of the files to be generated.
